titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of the week of March 25 through March 31, 2024, as "National Farmworker Awareness Week".
Expressing support for the designation of the week of March 25 through March 31, 2024, as "National Farmworker Awareness Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of National Farmworker Awareness Week and commends the significant contributions of farmworkers to our country.
